name: helpful-utils-lite
description: Lightweight utility library with debounce, throttle, and memoize functions (lodash-lite alternative).

scripts.minify: npx -y google-closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --env BROWSER --language_in ES_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2020 --rewrite_polyfills --warning_level QUIET --isolation_mode IIFE --js src/index.js --js_output_file dist/index.min.js
scripts.compile: npx -y google-closure-compiler --compilation_level SIMPLE --env BROWSER --language_in ES_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2020 --rewrite_polyfills --warning_level QUIET --isolation_mode IIFE --js src/index.js --js_output_file dist/index.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify

author: santaklouse
